name: Computational photography
tagline: Exercises from a graduate Computational Photography Class.
body:
Computational Photography
=========================

This repository contains exercises from a graduate Computational Photography Class I took at Stony Brook University, 2013.

![](http://i.imgur.com/VuswUpV.png)

*  Gradient-domain Fusion of Pictures. ![http://astro.sunysb.edu/steinkirch/reviews/comp_hw2.pdf](Here is the report.)

*  Face Morphism.[Here is the report.](http://astro.sunysb.edu/steinkirch/reviews/comp_hw3.pdf)

*  Automatic Colorization of Greyscale Faces. [Here is the report.](https://github.com/mariwahl/Computational_Photography)

Hacking the Kinect:
-------------------

[On Depth Sensors Applications for Computational ](http://astro.sunysb.edu/steinkirch/reviews/kin_pho.pdf)
![](http://i.imgur.com/8fhzRF3.png)

[A short white-paper about how to get started with Kinect in Linux.](http://astro.sunysb.edu/steinkirch/reviews/review_kinect_marina.pdf)
![](http://i.imgur.com/3zI4tO1.png)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
